summary: Diff implements key PWA/mobile UX pieces: adds a web manifest and HTML metadata, introduces a role-aware mobile bottom navigation for authenticated users, adds an install help dialog accessible from Landing and Header, and improves mobile usability via safe-area/touch-target utilities and responsive table patterns. However, the requested generated icon image assets themselves are not present in the diff summary, and an unrelated footer attribution/link appears to have been introduced.

missing_requirements.requirement: Use the provided generated icon assets (create 192x192, 512x512, 180x180 Apple touch, and 512x512 maskable icons from the 512x512 source) so the app icon displays correctly after installation.
missing_requirements.reason: The manifest and index.html reference the new icon paths, but the diff summary does not show the actual icon image files being added/created under frontend/public/assets/generated.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer attribution/link to caffeine.ai with a Â© 2026 notice.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any REQ; introduces new user-facing text and an external link unrelated to PWA/mobile conversion requirements.
